title: Chimichurri Sauce
directions: Add all ingredients except the olive oil to a food processor, and pulse a few times until chopped. Slowly stream in the olive oil, while pulsing the mixture a few more times until the olive oil is combined, and stopping to scrape down the sides of the food processor if needed.
Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate for up to 3 days.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley, tightly packed (about 1 bunch of parsley)
1 cup fresh cilantro, tightly packed (about 1 bunch of cilantro)
2 Tablespoons fresh lemon or lime juice
¼ tsp red pepper flakes, or more, to taste
